item.title: By: GOTRAX™ Partners with 12th Planet for ‘Sbass Oddysee’ Denver Residency, Offering Fans Chance to Meet and Race the Artist on its HOVERFLY KART - Chicago Evening Post

item.description: […] GOTRAX™, the Denver-based brand of premium hoverboards and electric rideables, today announces its partnership with electronic music icon 12th Planet, aka John Dadzie, for ‘Sbass Oddysee,’ a month-long residency at Denver’s Beta Nightclub. […]
